title: my pixel 4a's google assistant layout changed like the normal android
content:
my pixel 4a's  google assistant layout changed  like the normal android
- this is what the assistant looks like now- https://9to5google.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2019/05/google_assistant_car_1.jpg?quality=82&strip=all&w=1600

Before it was like this https://www.xda-developers.com/files/2020/08/New-Google-Assistant-Pixel-4a.jpg
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
